name: teleporter beacon
description: A bundle of sensors, memory storage, and quantum circuitry.  Using it once will capture location data; using it again will allow you to teleport to that location.  Keeping location data maintained will slowly consume electricity, and teleporting will require a LOT!
//: TODO: see about adding a world-global registry for teleporter locations, in order to make them installable on e.g. vehicles

name: quantum processor
description: A special, purpose-built circuit board: it calculates how to fold the universe up without breaking things.  In other words, it figures out how to teleport.
